general_info.summary: Foreign students are typically permitted one entry. However, with valid reasons, they can apply for additional entries through the Visa Facilitation Centre at the Ministry of Home Affairs in New Delhi.
general_info.raw_content: Q.11 How may ‘entries’ are allowed to foreign students? A. Normally one entry. However, on bonafide reasons, a foreign student can apply for additional entries at Visa Facilitation Centre, Foreigners Division, Ministry of Home Affairs, Jaisalmer House, 26, Mansingh Road, New Delhi – 110003.

admission_requirements.summary: Foreign students can obtain a Student Visa directly from Indian Missions abroad if they have secured confirmed admission to a course at a recognized institute in India.
admission_requirements.raw_content: Q.3 Can foreign students get a Student Visa directly from Indian Missions abroad? A. Yes, they can provided they have confirmed admission to a course in a reputed/recognized institute in India.
